title.narrative: Madagascar - Programme d’alimentation en eau potable et d’assainissement en milieu rural (2006 – 2008)
Madagascar - Rural Drinking Water Supply and Sanitation Programme (2006 – 2008)

description.narrative: Eight regions of the country

In the short-term, the objective of the project is to contribute to the improvement of the current health and socio-economic conditions of rural populations. Specifically, it aims at ensuring the sustainable supply of safe drinking water to rural populations and sanitation services. Lastly, the program aims to strengthen the resources and local capacity in the planning, management and maintenance of public investments.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERE DE L'ENERGIE ET DES MINES Direction de l'Eau et de l'Assainissemen

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management
